meanings.definition: To extract the essence from by boiling.
meanings.sent1: She decocts the tea leaves to make a flavorful brew.
meanings.sent2: The chef decocts the broth to enhance its taste.
meanings.sent3: The potion master decocts a magical elixir for the brave knight.
meanings.sent4: The sun decocts the rainwater, leaving behind pure crystals of salt.
meanings.sent5: The alchemist decocts the rare herbs, creating a powerful potion.
